text: aur (musalamaanon) dushamanon ke peechha karane mein sustee na karo agar ladaee mein tumako takaleef pahunchatee hai to jaisee tumako takaleef pahunchatee hai unako bhee vaisee hee azeeyat hotee hai aur (tumako) ye bhee (ummeed hai ki) tum khuda se vah vah ummeeden rakhate ho jo (unako) naseeb nahin aur khuda to sabase vaaqif (aur) hikamat vaala hai
